messages.message:
Hi Team, today I got a bunch of docker build hang issues:
• job service or model service container hang and cannot `docker kill -rf` - solved here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1748557930271679?thread_ts=1747136999.593749&cid=C05L87V014J) 
• webapp hang,  e.g. the screenshot just hangs there forever.  - restarting it doesn't help and only hang there again. Tweaking the dockerfile wouldn't help either 
Anyone has ideas what changes to crafting services today?
I ran into similar problems. I noticed some builds were failing with 403s, while others were stuck like in your screenshot. I ran the `ecr-login` script, and restarted the sandbox and it helped.

Great! yes `ecr-login` will fix 403 issue.
let me restart the entire sandbox and see what happens

Actually got issues from more services :smiling_face_with_tear: hanging, keep building from scratch..and etc.

trying init db and see if it can fix
